the	birth.	You	may	be	offered

to the hospital or midwifery

It’s a good opportunity to ask 
any questions and sort out any 
problems that are troubling 
you. You may like to make a list 
of questions to take along with 
you so that you don’t forget 
what you want to ask.
What usually happens
• You will be weighed and
